metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6857 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: When resolving a symlink, a race may occur where the buffer passed to`readlink` may actually be smaller than necessary.*This bug only affects Firefox on Unix-based operating systems (Android,Linux, MacOS). Windows is unaffected.* This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 115.6, Thunderbird < 115.6, and Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
